types.name: Matte Porcelain
types.description: Durable matte-finish porcelain tiles suitable for modern interiors, offering slip resistance and a soft natural look.

types.name: Polished Porcelain
types.description: High-gloss porcelain tiles with a mirror-like surface, ideal for luxury residential and commercial interiors.

types.name: Outdoor Porcelain
types.description: Thick anti-slip outdoor porcelain designed for terraces, gardens, pathways, and high-traffic areas.

types.name: Wood-Look Porcelain
types.description: Porcelain tiles designed to mimic natural wood while offering water resistance and long-lasting durability.
